/*
    fragCoord.x = [0.5f; 799.5f].
    fragCoord.y = [0.5f; 449.5f].
*/

void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    float radius = (iResolution.y * 0.5f - 1.0f) * 0.5f;     // Circle radius.
    float modulated =                                        // Sine modulated radius.
        (radius + 1.0f) + sin(iTime) * radius; 
    
    float x = fragCoord.x - iResolution.x * 0.5;             // Map x from [0.5f; 799.5f] to [-400.5f; 400.5f].
    float y = fragCoord.y - iResolution.y * 0.5;             // Map y from [0.5f; 449.5f] to [-225.5f; 225.5f].

    float distance = sqrt(x * x + y * y);                    // Distance from circle center to edge.
    float sw = clamp((distance - modulated), 0.0f, 1.0f);    // If distance < 0.0f then sw = 1.0f, otherwise sw = 0.0f.

    vec3 background = vec3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);                // Background rgb-color.
    vec3 circle = vec3(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);                    // Circle rgb-color.
    vec3 color = mix(background, circle, sw);                // Pixel rgb-color.


    fragColor = vec4(color, 1.0);                            // Pixel rgba-color.
}
